医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美敦力 (Medtronic) 的 Evolut 瓣膜可减少严重主动脉瓣狭窄女性的功能障碍，提高其生活质量全球医疗保健技术领导者美敦力 (Medtronic) 今天公布了最大的经股经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 头对头比较试验 SMall Annuli 随机进化或 SAPIEN (SMART) 试验的新数据，该试验专门针对女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medtronice28099s-Evolut-valve-reduces-dysfunction-improves-quality-of-life-in-women-with-severe-aortic-stenos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medtronice28099s-Evolut-valve-reduces-dysfunction-improves-quality-of-life-in-women-with-severe-aortic-stenos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a1c4c0-8860-41ae-93d3-37743edd1bb2 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:18:00 -0400 Medtronic’s Evolut valve reduces dysfunction, improves quality of life in women with severe aortic stenos
牙医解释阿尔茨海默氏症和口腔健康之间的联系本周是痴呆症行动周，这是一项在英国各地举行的活动，旨在让公众采取行动，帮助改善痴呆症患者的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dentist-explains-the-connection- Between-Alzheimers-and-oral-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dentist-explains-the-connection- Between-Alzheimers-and-oral-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=385a7b2a-2b54-4939-9b67-8789e837f651 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:11:00 -0400 Dentist explains the connection between Alzheimer's and oral health
新型登革热疫苗TAK-003获得世界卫生组织高负担地区资格预审一种新的登革热疫苗于 2024 年 5 月 10 日获得世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的资格预审。TAK-003 是第二种获得世界卫生组织资格预审的登革热疫苗。它由武田开发，是一种减毒活疫苗，含有引起登革热的四种病毒血清型的弱化版本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-dengue-vaccine-TAK-003-gains-WHO-prequalification-for-high-burden-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-dengue-vaccine-TAK-003-gains-WHO-prequalification-for-high-burden-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e90900d-6953-4304-a508-34f5fca49d06 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:07:00 -0400 New dengue vaccine TAK-003 gains WHO prequalification for high-burden areas
研究表明救护车内血压治疗对中风患者有明显的好处最新研究表明，早期识别中风类型可能是利用早期救护车降压治疗疑似急性中风患者的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Study-shows-clear-benefits-of-in-ambulance-blood-Pressure-treatment-for-中风-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Study-shows-clear-benefits-of-in-ambulance-blood-Pressure-treatment-for-中风-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6281bb2d-8a47-4ca3-aa21-6602de643137 Mon, 20 May 2024 03:56:00 -0400 Study shows clear benefits of in-ambulance blood pressure treatment for stroke patients
MHRA 获得 180 万英镑用于促进抗菌药物创新和诊断在 180 万英镑的新奖励的支持下，药品和保健产品监管机构 (MHRA) 将建立一个专门团队，为创造新型抗菌药物和诊断方法的创新者提供监管科学支持，这是英国卫生和保健部领导的计划的一部分。社会关怀 (DHSC) 支持国际社会应对日益严重的抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/MHRA-receives-c2a318-million-to-boost-antimicrobial-innovation-and-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/MHRA-receives-c2a318-million-to-boost-antimicrobial-innovation-and-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01ef6737-3a10-4151-bd3a-422bf0664711 Mon, 20 May 2024 03:52:00 -0400
机器学习增强神经胶质瘤突变的早期检测机器学习 (ML) 方法可以快速准确地诊断神经胶质瘤（原发性脑肿瘤）的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Machine-learning-enhances-early-detection-of-glioma-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Machine-learning-enhances-early-detection-of-glioma-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb939ec4-640d-466c-9de4-64b476f3e53c Mon, 20 May 2024 03:46:00 -0400
Ovum AI 推出澳大利亚首个纵向数据集，彻底改变女性医疗保健在人工智能和女性数据的支持下，健康管理应用程序 Ovum AI 今天达到了一个重要的里程碑，进入了数百名女性的试点阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Ovum-AI-launches-Australiae28099s-first-longitudinal-dataset-to-revolutionize-womene28099s-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Ovum-AI-launches-Australiae28099s-first-longitudinal-dataset-to-revolutionize-womene28099s-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a39eb6e-3d9b-460f-bdfc-896132d296ae Mon, 20 May 2024 03:41:00 -0400 Ovum AI launches Australia’s first longitudinal dataset to revolutionize women’s healthcare
消除肺功能测试中的种族调整可能会改变诊断和残疾资格哈佛医学院科学家领导的最新研究表明，从估计肺功能的方程中删除种族将改变患者群体中疾病严重程度的分类，使更多的黑人进入晚期疾病类别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Elimination-race- adjustment-in-lung-function-tests-may-alter-diagnosis-and-disability-eligibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Elimination-race- adjustment-in-lung-function-tests-may-alter-diagnosis-and-disability-eligibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4aa81e1-15e6-4ab4-b234-d8b29b29e04a Mon, 20 May 2024 02:11:40 -0400 Eliminating race adjustment in lung function tests may alter diagnosis and disability eligibility
对乙酰氨基酚具有预防脓毒症患者急性呼吸窘迫综合征和器官损伤的潜力美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一项临床试验发现，静脉注射对乙酰氨基酚可降低败血症患者发生器官损伤或出现急性呼吸窘迫综合征的风险，急性呼吸窘迫综合征是一种导致液体渗漏到肺部的严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Acetaminophen-shows-pottial-in-preventing-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome-organ-injury-in-sepsis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Acetaminophen-shows-pottial-in-preventing-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome-organ-injury-in-sepsis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=130ab694-4937-4ad4-8976-f573803439f0 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:52:20 -0400 Acetaminophen shows potential in preventing acute respiratory distress syndrome, organ injury in sepsis patients
女性胃肠科医生与咨询后医疗保健使用率较低有关一项即将提交的研究显示，与男性胃肠病学家初次就诊的患者相比，女性胃肠病学家初次就诊的患者在就诊后两年内不太可能在急诊科、医院或初级保健办公室接受医疗护理2024 年消化系统疾病周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Female-gastroenterologies-linked-to-lower-post-consultation-health-care-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Female-gastroenterologies-linked-to-lower-post-consultation-health-care-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f1175d2-ab10-46d6-8694-18a4496b5d59 Mon, 20 May 2024 01:32:19 -0400 Female gastroenterologists linked to lower post-consultation health care use
